channel.title: Geeky on wordbit
channel.description: Recent content in Geeky on wordbit

item.title: Three amazing new technologies that will blow your mind
item.description: I’ve been thinking about the future and what it might bring. In my last post I talked about a 1988 school project that accurately predicted the dawn of the tablet age. Well, here are three emerging technologies that are quite simply gob smacking. You have to see these videos to believe. Quantum Levitation You know that magnetic forces repel and attract, but did you know these laws can be bended so an object stays fixed in empty space?

item.title: Firefly: My review
item.description: I recently finished watching the complete Firefly series on Netflix. That sounds like a lot of TV watching, but it only ran for 14 episodes before it got cancelled due to low ratings. Most geeks agree, however, that this show was a little gem, was poorly marketed by Fox, and should never have died so early. After watching it, I would have to agree. I guess this show falls into the space-western genre, and with plenty of horses, bandits, prostitutes, and bounty hunters, I’d say it falls more into the “western” part of the spectrum.
